resources.string: Your service provider does not support disabling call forwarding when your phone is busy.

Turn off airplane mode to place a call
Allow the phone to send and receive data
Allow mobile data? Additional charges may apply depending on your network subscription. To avoid additional charges, disable mobile data when finished.
Unless you use Wi-Fi, you will no longer be able to use the Internet, Email or other apps that require a data connection. Turn off the mobile data connection?
Could not add/edit fixed dialing contact. Check PIN2 or SIM card storage capacity.
Network unavailable. Do you want to select it anyway?
Allow national data roaming? Provides access to data while you are outside your home network, in your home country. Data transmission charges may be higher.
Allow international roaming? Provides access to data services while you are outside your home network or home country. Data transmission charges may be higher.
International data roaming charges apply to data usage outside of the U.S., Puerto Rico and U.S.V.I. Turn off data roaming to avoid international data roaming charges.
Note that microphone noise suppression works only when you talk directly in the phone, not when you use the speaker or a headset.
Microphone noise suppression makes it easier for the other party to hear you; it will not affect how you perceive the conversation.
Far-end noise suppression reduces the noise from the other party on the call
PUK2 locked. Contact service provider to unlock.
Could not delete fixed dialing contact
Provides a richer voice listening experience during calls
Slow down the speech of the other calling party
Could not search network during a call. End the call and retry later.
Could not search networks while using mobile data. Temporarily disable mobile data and continue?
Drag the Reject with message bar up to this region to open message list
Maximum of 140 bytes supported for one message
"I'm busy all day. Call me back later."
"I'm on another phone call. I'll call you back later."
"I'm busy. I'll call you back later."
"I'm on another phone call. I'll call you back later."
"I'm in a meeting. I'll call you back later."
"I'm driving. I'll call you back later."
"I can't talk now. Please send me a message."
"I'm eating. I'll call you back later."
Manage reject messages for incoming calls
Memory full. Recording stopped and saved in internal storage.
Audio resource is not available. Please quit the related application and record the call again.
Deselect to turn on Answering Machine only manually
You must record a greeting before you can use Answering Machine.
Tap [Play] to listen to your greeting and then tap [Save] to save or [Record] to record again.
If you delete this greeting, Answering Machine will become unavailable. Delete anyway?
Recording in progress in another app. Cannot record.
If you delete all greetings, Answering Machine will become unavailable. Delete anyway?

"Answering Machine differs from the voicemail service provided by your operator. This feature picks up incoming calls for you, plays your specified greeting, and records callers' messages on your Xperia™.
*Answering Machine is unavailable when the device is in airplane mode or out of network coverage. *At least one greeting must be recorded before use."

"Answering Machine differs from the voicemail service provided by your operator. This feature picks up incoming calls for you, plays your specified greeting, and records callers' messages on your Xperia™.
*Answering Machine is unavailable when the device is in airplane mode or out of network coverage."
Depending on the ring time you specify here, your voicemail may pick up incoming calls before Answering Machine.
Please be aware that using Answering Machine abroad may result in substantial roaming charges.
Use Answering Machine when traveling abroad
Message cannot be recorded/played during call.
You have a missed call. Do you know that there is a built-in Answering Machine in your Xperia™? Tap here to enable it.
Enables the ability to record calls

"When enabled, you will be able to record any ongoing call from the ongoing call menu.
The phone can record up to 30 minutes of conversation. While recording, the participants will be played a tone regularly to indicate that the call is being recorded.
Recorded calls can be played back in the call details in the call log.
-User Liability-
Note that in many regions, the recording of a conversation without the consent of the other participant is illegal. Please consult the telephone recording laws for your state or country before proceeding.
By agreeing to these terms I take full responsibility for complying with any regional laws and restrictions. I am fully aware that any violations of such laws are my own responsibility."
Plays a beep tone to all participants while recording call
Enable call recording to adjust setting

"Note that disabling the recording beep interval may subject you to unauthorized surveillance in your country or region if you don’t receive a verbal consent for the recording from the other party.
Please consult the telephone recording laws for your state or country before proceeding.
By agreeing to these terms I take full responsibility for complying with any regional laws and restrictions. I am fully aware that any violations of such laws are my own responsibility."
Verbosed log level enabled for Phone.
Normal log level enabled for Phone.

"A special call needs to be made to activate your phone service.
After pressing “Activate”, listen to the instructions provided to activate your phone."
Listen to the instructions to activate your phone. Stay on the line until you hear confirmation that your phone is activated.
Please wait while your phone is being programmed.
Your phone is now activated. It may take up to 15 minutes for service to start.

"Your phone did not activate. You may need to find an area with better coverage (near a window, or outside).
Try again or call customer service for more options."
